divs: Sighting Detailsdriving home from work driving north on Sheridan stopped at the light at 6th ave looked over towards the west and observed a bright light above the horizon about a minute long enough to take a picture traffic started to move and I looked over to see if it was there but there was no sign of it.
trends: There have been 39 other sightings in Lakewood
There were no other sightings in Lakewood on or around January 18th 2012
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: a round glow of light in the western sky over the mtns
